title: Delete a problem template
content:
You can delete a template when it becomes obsolete.

To delete a template:

  1. From the main menu, select Run > Problem > Templates.
  2. Select the problem template.
  3. Click Delete on the toolbar.
  4. Click OK to confirm the deletion.

After you apply a template to a record and save the record, there is no further relationship with the template. You can delete the template without affecting the values in the saved record.
